The Chronicles of Arram was a philosophical work written and published sometime before the destruction of the city of Phlan in the beginning of the 14 century DR.
A copy of The Chronicles was left in Mantors Library in the city of Phlan as the city fell into ruins during a Rage of Dragons of the .
